Hello, It's Me

Hlolo Modiane

And I'm a

I'm a self-taught Frontend software developer and former fashion designer, based in South Africa. My strengths include continuous learning, improving my work, achieving excellence, and ensuring client satisfaction.

More About Me

About Me

Frontend Developer!

I am a skilled web developer with experience in creating captivating website designs and implementing the latest technologies to build modern, trend-driven websites. My background in Fashion Design has equipped me with valuable soft and hard skills, such as attention to detail, creativity, and tailoring solutions to meet clients' unique needs.
